oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Upstairs tenants on the lawn of the Adkins family home
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Upstairs tenants lounge on the lawn of the Adkins family home at 819 Franklin Street. The Adkins rented upstairs room in their home to service members and other individuals during WWII. On verso, "Home at 819 Franklin. Adkins home. People lived upstairs apt. during war".
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Apartment dwellers; Dwellings
